T02D2150:244b-1: n'i l'am ba ra dha ra badzra p'a ni s'a dha na no pi ka tsandha n'a ma /
T02D2150:245a-0: lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi sgrub pa'i thabs @245a * //
T02D2150:245a-1: mdor bsdus pa zhes bya ba /
T02D2150:245a-2: dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2150:245a-3: sngar nyid don dam thugs chud 'gro ba'i don du rdo rje'i sku //
T02D2150:245a-4: gnas mdzad mthu stobs khyad 'phags gdug pa rnams kyi dgrar gyur pa //
T02D2150:245a-5: rgya mtshor zhabs gzhag 'jig dus me dpung dang ldan snying rjes khros //
T02D2150:245a-6: rtog pa'i sdug bsngal thar mdzad khyod la dangs bo kun gyis 'dud //
T02D2150:245a-7: rtsod pa'i dus gang phrad gyur brtson 'grus chung zhing blo zhen pas //
T02D2150:245a-8: shin tu bsdus la dga' zhing ma btsal 'bras bu 'dod la gzud phyir dran //
T02D2150:245a-9: de la snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas khrus byas te /
T02D2150:245a-10: yid du 'ong ba'i bsam gtan gyi khang par stan
T02D2150:245a-11: bde ba la 'dug nas rang gi snying ga'i sa
T02D2150:245a-12: bon gyi 'od zer gyis phyogs bcu gangg'a'i klung gi
T02D2150:245a-13: sangs rgyas rnams dang de'i sras rnams mdun du sbyan
T02D2150:245a-14: drangs te / mchod pa'i yo byad lngas yang dag par mchod pa /
T02D2150:245a-15: sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa bya'o //
T02D2150:245a-16: de'i rjes su aom ma h'a sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a
T02D2150:245a-17: na badzra sva bh'a wa a'atmkonyham zhes brjod pa dang
T02D2150:245a-18: bcas pas stong pa nyid du bsgom mo //
T02D2150:245a-19: de nas pam las padma'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor h'um dang bcas pa bsams te /
T02D2150:245a-20: de yang ring po'i sgra dang ldan zhing 'od zer 'phro ba can no //
T02D2150:245a-21: de yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje rtse lnga dang ldan ba'i sa bon las 'od 'phros te /
T02D2150:245a-22: phyogs bcu gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas spyan drangs te /
T02D2150:245a-24: de yongs su gyur pa las sangs rgyas gos sngon po can /
T02D2150:245a-26: g-yon brkyang ba g-yas bskum pa /
T02D2150:245a-27: sku mdog mthing nag sbyan me'i phung po 'dra ba /
T02D2150:245a-28: ya sos ma mchu mnan pa /
T02D2150:245a-29: 'brug sgra can gyi dbugs tsha ba /
T02D2150:245a-31: phyag g-yas na rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsnams pa /
T02D2150:245a-32: g-yon na sdigs mdzub mjad pa /
T02D2150:245a-33: gos sngon po can la ltos 'gro brgyad kyis brgyan pa /
T02D2150:245a-34: bdud la sogs pa tshar gcod pa'i tshul can du bdag nyid bsam mo //
T02D2150:245a-35: rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gyis rang dang 'dra ba'i ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs te /
T02D2150:245a-36: snying po bzhis tha mi dad par bya /
T02D2150:245a-37: de nas byin gyis brlab cing dbang bskur ro //
T02D2150:245a-38: ji srid skyo bar ma gyur gyi bar du bsgom zhing /
T02D2150:245a-39: skyo ba'i tshe sangs rgyas gangg'a'i klung gi rjes su
T02D2150:245b-0: @245b gnang ba'i phreng ba'i sngags kho na bzlas par
T02D2150:245b-1: bya'o // bsdus pa dag la dga' bas ni /
T02D2150:245b-2: aom n'i l'am bar dha ra badzra p'a ni hri
T02D2150:245b-3: da ya ma ho kro dha s'a dha h'um phat
T02D2150:245b-4: / snying po'i sngags nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o //
T02D2150:245b-5: aom n'i l'am bar dha ra badzra p'a ni dhar ma h'a kro dha s'a dha h'um /
T02D2150:245b-7: yang snying ste bcu bdun pa'o //
T02D2150:245b-8: gtong bar 'dod pa'i cho gtor ma phul la /
T02D2150:245b-9: ye shes sems dpa' phyung ste gshegs su gsol lo //
T02D2150:245b-10: spyod lam thams cad du yang rang lha'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas gnas par bya'o //
T02D2150:245b-11: kha zas gos sogs zas skom dang //
T02D2150:245b-12: dbul ba kun zad nad med dang //
T02D2150:245b-13: 'jigs chen brgyad dang sdug bsngal sogs //
T02D2150:245b-14: 'jigs pa med cing gang bsam pa'i //
T02D2150:245b-15: 'dod ba'i don rnams thams cad ni /
T02D2150:245b-18: de la dgongs nas bde gshegs kyis //
T02D2150:245b-19: byang chub lam ni sna tshogs gsungs //
T02D2150:245b-20: rang 'dod lam ni thob bya'i phyir //
T02D2150:245b-21: dad pas bla ma bzang bcal te //
T02D2150:245b-22: ji srid bla ma mnyes byas nas //
T02D2150:245b-23: 'dod don man ngag blang bar bya /
T02D2150:245b-24: mnyes pas yin gyi gzhan gyis min //
T02D2150:245b-25: bdag gis sgrub thabs mdor bsdus smras //
T02D2150:245b-26: smras pas zla ba lngar gsal ba'i //
T02D2150:245b-27: dag cing nam mkhar mi shong ba'i //
T02D2150:245b-28: dge ba gang gis thob pa gang //
T02D2150:245b-29: 'dir bzhugs 'dod lha'i zhal mthong shog / dpal phyag
T02D2150:245b-30: na rdo rje'i sgrub thabs mdor bsdus pa zhes bya
T02D2150:245b-31: ba / nam gru'i rigs las byung ba /
T02D2150:245b-32: dngos grub brnyes pa'i slob dpon chen po dz'a ba ri pas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D2150:245b-34: // / bal po'i pandi ta de wa p'u rna ma ti dang /
